item.title: v0.11.2
item.description:
Vorta v0.11.2 is a maintenance release focused on stability and modernization. Key highlights include:

  • Bug fixes: Resolved KWallet password retrieval issues, fixed tree model crashes and performance problems, and corrected schedule initialization timing
  • Packaging modernization: Migrated to uv for modern Python packaging
  • Code quality: Added missing signal cleanup handlers and removed unused parameters
  • macOS: Reverted to using borg-dir binary for improved compatibility
  • Testing: Fixed failing tests and improved cross-platform test coverage

Welcome to new contributor @cincodenada!

What's Changed

  • Bump test versions, fix failing tests by @m3nu in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2322
  • Modernize packaging, use uv by @m3nu in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2323
  • refactor: add missing signal cleanup handlers in view classes by @m3nu in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2324
  • Revert to using borg-dir binary on macos by @m3nu in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2325
  • Skip darwin tests on non-darwin platforms by @cincodenada in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2319
  • refactor: remove unused profile_id from schedule_changed signal by @m3nu in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2330
  • KWallet password retrieval broken by incorrect get_result() return type by @m3nu in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2328
  • bug: fix tree model pointer exception and performance by @m3nu in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2333
  • fix: Delay updating schedule until after fields have been initialized by @cincodenada in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2317

New Contributors

  • @cincodenada made their first contribution in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2319

item.title: v0.11.0
item.description:
After 2 months of testing we are ready to release the next major version of Vorta. Much of this was contributed by our Google Summer of Code student, @VandalByte. A big thanks to him for all his work over the summer.

Highlights:

  • Change passphrase feature (#2224) ‚Äî Users can now change their repository passphrase directly from Vorta's UI, eliminating the need to drop to the command line for this common security operation. This was a long-requested feature dating back to issue #303.
  • Unified file selector (#2237) ‚Äî Replaces the confusing dual-dialog approach (separate dialogs for files vs folders) with a single tree-view selector that supports multi-selection for both. This addresses a longstanding UX pain point caused by Qt limitations.
  • Fix GUI freezing during pre-backup commands (#2214) ‚Äî Pre-backup scripts that took more than a few seconds would freeze the entire interface until completion. The backup now runs asynchronously, keeping the UI responsive.

All changes

  • add exclude patterns for most common media files and .part files by @renner0e in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2145
  • remove setuptools from install_requires by @dotlambda in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2187

  • Add a new unified file selector by @VandalByte in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2237
  • Fix broken transifex link by @VandalByte in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2250
  • feat: refresh metadata by @renner0e in https://github.com/borgbase/vorta/pull/2247

item.title: v0.7.6
item.description:
This release adds a number of bug fixes, as well as two new features developed by @phihos and @rblenis. Also special thanks to @bastiencyr for a number of bug fixes.

You can now import and export settings related to a single profile to JSON. The same JSON can be used to bootstrap a new Vorta installation. E.g. to set up a device via MDM. More about this feature in the docs.

New features:

  • Import/export settings (or bootstrap with default config). By @phihos (#955)
  • Add support for 'diff --json-lines'. By @rblenis (#909)

Bugfixes and refinements:

  • Alert when deleting last profile. By @bastiencyr. (#1006)
  • Add /opt/homebrew/bin to PATH. Fixes #1001 (#1002)
  • Put folders first in diff/extract. Fixes #915. By @bastiencyr (#999)
  • Skip sizing folders on permission error. Fixes #968 (#969)
  • Called set_progress() on wrong class. (#965)
  • Fix color for eye icon when masking password (#959)
  • Refuse to add inaccessible folders, warn on inaccessible files during backup (#951)
  • Check for full disk access on macOS (#952)
  • Open window on left-click on Linux. Fixes #938 (#945)
  • Fix issue #940 - KeyError in get_dict_from_list. By @rblenis (#947)
  • Correctly rename profile in dropdown. Fixes #943 (#944)
  • Fix 'list --json-lines' command when only a single result line is output. By @rblenis (#910)
